name: AssociateRunnerWithTeam
description:
Associate a runner with a specified team.

This tool allows you to associate a specific runner with a team in PagerDuty. Use it when you need to link automation actions runners to teams.

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the resource to associate a runner with a team in PagerDuty.

parameters.name: accept_version_header
parameters.description: Specify the API version using the 'Accept' header for versioning.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type_json
parameters.description: Specify the content type as 'application/json' for the request header.

parameters.name: team_association_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details for team association. Include the 'team' field with relevant information.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Pagerduty API.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
